mapper.sql: id, sealNum, containerNo, boxTypeID, billofladingNo, areaID, containerDate, stevedoreID, cost, cubicNum, statue, notes, stevedoreNotes, supervisedCbm, corpNo
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from cec_creatboxtbl
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into cec_creatboxtbl (id, sealNum, containerNo, boxTypeID, billofladingNo, areaID, containerDate, stevedoreID, cost, cubicNum, statue, notes, stevedoreNotes, supervisedCbm, corpNo ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sealnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{containerno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{boxtypeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{billofladingno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areaid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{containerdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stevedoreid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cost,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cubicnum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{statue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stevedorenotes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supervisedcbm,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{corpno,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

sealNum,

billofladingNo,
areaID,
containerDate,

cost,

mapper.update:
update cec_creatboxtbl
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sealNum = #{record.sealnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
containerNo = #{record.containerno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
boxTypeID = #{record.boxtypeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
billofladingNo = #{record.billofladingno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
areaID = #{record.areaid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
containerDate = #{record.containerdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stevedoreID = #{record.stevedoreid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cost = #{record.cost,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cubicNum = #{record.cubicnum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
statue = #{record.statue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
notes = #{record.notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stevedoreNotes = #{record.stevedorenotes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
supervisedCbm = #{record.supervisedcbm,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
corpNo = #{record.corpno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update cec_creatboxtbl set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sealNum = #{record.sealnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, containerNo = #{record.containerno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, boxTypeID = #{record.boxtypeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, billofladingNo = #{record.billofladingno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, areaID = #{record.areaid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, containerDate = #{record.containerdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stevedoreID = #{record.stevedoreid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cost = #{record.cost,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cubicNum = #{record.cubicnum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, statue = #{record.statue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, notes = #{record.notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stevedoreNotes = #{record.stevedorenotes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, supervisedCbm = #{record.supervisedcbm,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, corpNo = #{record.corpno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update cec_creatboxtbl
sealNum = #{sealnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
containerNo = #{containerno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
boxTypeID = #{boxtypeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
billofladingNo = #{billofladingno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
areaID = #{areaid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
containerDate = #{containerdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stevedoreID = #{stevedoreid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cost = #{cost,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cubicNum = #{cubicnum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
statue = #{statue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
notes = #{notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stevedoreNotes = #{stevedorenotes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
supervisedCbm = #{supervisedcbm,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
corpNo = #{corpno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update cec_creatboxtbl set sealNum = #{sealnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, containerNo = #{containerno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, boxTypeID = #{boxtypeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, billofladingNo = #{billofladingno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, areaID = #{areaid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, containerDate = #{containerdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stevedoreID = #{stevedoreid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cost = #{cost,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cubicNum = #{cubicnum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, statue = #{statue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, notes = #{notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stevedoreNotes = #{stevedorenotes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, supervisedCbm = #{supervisedcbm,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, corpNo = #{corpno,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select a.*, b.typeName boxTypeName, c.typeName areaName from cec_creatboxtbl a left join cec_basictbl b on a.boxTypeID = b.id left join cec_basictbl c on a.areaID = c.id where 1=1 and a.id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select t.*, b1.customerName from (select b.*,a.id cid from cec_containertbl a, cec_inboundtbl b where 1 = 1 and a.inBoundIndex = b.id and a.sealNum = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and b.corpNo = #{corpNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) t left join cec_customertbl b1 on t.customerID = b1.id order by t.date desc
